critique: The document focuses on efficiency, accountability, and transparency in government. The primary emotions the President likely wants to elicit are joy (from improved government services and reduced waste) and trust (which can be linked to a sense of security and reduced fear). There might be some surprise at the extent of the reforms and the innovative approaches being implemented. Sadness, anger, and disgust are less prominent, as the document aims to correct past inefficiencies rather than dwell on negative emotions. The initial scores reflect this assessment.
